long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: X-Gangs is a powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your Twitter (X) experience by connecting you with like-minded communities. This extension allows users to join "gangs" - groups of Twitter users who share common interests or goals. Once you're part of a gang, X-Gangs automatically enhances your Twitter browsing experience in several ways
